abstract: In a new approach, citations from news reports, images and video will be combined in results of a single query.
snippet: In a new approach, citations from news reports, images and video will be combined in results of a single query.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., May 16  Google said on Wednesday that it was changing its approach to Internet searches by combining results from its established Web search service with offerings that help users find videos, images, maps and other content.

headline.main: Google’s One-Stop Search to Yield Text and Images
headline.print_headline: Google’s One-Stop Search To Yield Text and Images

abstract: A week after confirming that it hired an investment bank to explore “strategic alternatives,” 24/7 Real Media has decided that a sale is the way to go. The company, which provides online marketing services, said it agreed to be bought by advertising and marketing firm WPP Group for $11.75 per share in cash, or about $649 million net of cash acquired. The sale of 24/7 is just the latest in a string of deals involving online advertising companies: Google recently bought DoubleClick for $3.1 billion, and Yahoo  paid $680 million for the part of Right Media that it didn’t already own.
lead_paragraph: A week after confirming that it hired an investment bank to explore “strategic alternatives,” 24/7 Real Media has decided that a sale is the way to go. The company, which provides online marketing services, said it agreed to be bought by advertising and marketing firm WPP Group for $11.75 per share in cash, or about $649 million net of cash acquired. The sale of 24/7 is just the latest in a string of deals involving online advertising companies: Google recently bought DoubleClick for $3.1 billion, and Yahoo  paid $680 million for the part of Right Media that it didn’t already own.

headline.main: Advertising Group WPP Takes 24/7 Real Media
